macro_summary.fed_stance: Neutral hold, 75% probability of hold in March

strategy.rationale: Weak USD and risk-off sentiment (VIX >20) provide support for gold. Fed neutral stance and flat real yields limit upside. Geopolitical tensions (US-Iran) add safe-haven bid.
strategy.entry: Look for dips toward $2,650-2,660 support for long entries
strategy.risk_management: Use 1-2% account risk per trade. Consider scaling in on pullbacks.

strategy.rationale: Silver benefits from weak USD, risk-off mood, and rising copper (industrial demand proxy). Stronger than gold due to copper correlation. Limited by flat growth outlook.
strategy.risk_management: Silver is more volatile than gold; reduce position size by 30-40% vs gold trades.

strategy.rationale: Geopolitical risk (US-Iran tensions) supports oil, but inventory build (-1) and weak USD offset. Neutral growth outlook limits demand expectations.
strategy.risk_management: Oil is headline-sensitive; use tight stops and monitor geopolitical news closely.

strategy.rationale: Strong score driven by narrowing credit spreads (+1), weak USD, and risk-off paradox (VIX rising but equities resilient). Fed neutral and flat yields supportive. Broad market strength.
strategy.risk_management: ES is liquid; use standard 1-2% risk. Watch for VIX spikes above 25 as exit signal.

strategy.rationale: Weak USD and risk-off mood support, but rising MOVE index (-1, rate volatility) pressures tech. SOX rising (+1) is bullish for semis. Lower than ES due to rate sensitivity.
strategy.risk_management: NQ is volatile; reduce size by 20% vs ES. Monitor 10Y yields and MOVE index.

strategy.rationale: Strong score from steepening yield curve (+1), narrowing credit spreads, weak USD, and risk-off resilience. Value/cyclical tilt benefits from curve steepening.
strategy.risk_management: YM less volatile than NQ; can use slightly larger position size. Watch financials sector.

strategy.rationale: Strongest equity bias alongside ES/YM. Narrow credit spreads (2x weight, +2) and steepening curve (+1) highly bullish for small caps. Risk-off mood offset by credit strength.
strategy.risk_management: RTY is highly volatile; reduce position size by 30-40% vs ES. Requires strong risk appetite.

strategy.rationale: Weak USD (+1) and risk-off mood (+1) support EUR. ECB neutral hold (0) and flat rate differential (0) limit upside. Eurozone growth data missing but assumed stable.
strategy.risk_management: EUR/USD is liquid; standard position sizing. Watch ECB speakers for policy shifts.

strategy.rationale: Weak score due to RBA hawkish hike (-2) and narrowing rate differential (-1). Risk-off mood (2x, +2) and rising copper (+1) provide support. Conflicting signals.
strategy.entry: Wait for clarity; if long, enter above 0.6450 with strong risk-on confirmation
strategy.risk_management: AUD is volatile and conflicted; reduce size by 50%. Monitor RBA rhetoric and China data closely.

strategy.rationale: Highest score (+8) driven by BoJ hawkish tightening (2x, +2), widening rate differential (2x, +4), weak USD (+1), and risk-off mood (+1). JPY strength is multi-factor and high conviction.
strategy.entry: Long on any dip to 0.00680-0.00685 (JPY futures) or USD/JPY short below 147.00
strategy.risk_management: High conviction trade; can use 2-3% risk. Monitor BoJ speakers and spring rate hike expectations. Signal decay: 1-2 weeks.
